title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score People Experiences: Group level aggregates for Meetings and Teamwork
description: ,We are adding group level aggregates to Adoption Score people experiences for Meetings and Teamwork. Group information can be viewed across five Azure Active Directory attributes â€“ Company, Department, Country, State and City. For group level aggregate information to be displayed, the capability must be enabled by a Global Administrator and a minimum of 10 users must be included in a group to ensure that individual users cannot be tracked.
